item.title: Primary Typeface
item.description: Typography Proxima Nova is safe to use for both print and web. All design assets should be created using this font. Headlines and Body Text https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts/proxima-nova Designed by: Mark Simonson and first released through FontHaus in 1994. Fun fact: Proxima Nova was originally named Zanzibar. Proxima Nova Characters abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ‘ ? ’ “ ! ” ( % ) [ # ] { @ } / & \ < - + ÷ × = > ® © $ € £ ¥ ¢ : ; , .

item.title: InfluxData Brand Colors
item.description: InfluxData Brand Colors Main colors The main color palette will cover the majority of your needs. Main color gradient #9B2AFF #9394FF C: 100% M: 97% Y: 32% K: 49% R: 20 G: 20 B: 69 #020A47 Pantone: 2766C C: 50% M: 0% Y: 18% K: 0% R: 94 G: 228 B: 228 #5EE4E4 Pantone: 305C C: 1% M: 1% Y: 1% K: 0% R: 250 G: 250 B: 250
